short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn everyday shopping into support for your favorite cause with the ShopRaise App.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Turn your everyday shopping into support for your favorite cause. Whether itâ€™s shopping for daily essentials like groceries, buying furniture for your home office, or even booking your next trip, the ShopRaise app lets you shop for your cause. Earn up to 10% on each purchase with the ShopRaise chrome extension, all at no cost to you. 

Support your cause by shopping
ShopRaise works with Charities, Schools, Teams, Clubs, Individuals and Faith Based organizations to provide supporters a simple way to shop and benefit their cause.
We have over 1,300 participating retailers and 250 gift cards 

You can also take advantage of thousands of coupons and deals every day. 

Features:
- Automated overlays appear on participating retailers reminding you about contribution opportunities
- Quick access to your favorite retailers and brands
- Integrated search to find participating retailers and gift cards
- Customized with the logo of your chosen cause
- Easily view your qualifying transactions cause's results 

Are you a School, Charity, Team, Club or Faith-based organization? 
If you are an organization and want to add ShopRaise to your fundraising efforts simply go to www.shopRaise.com/organizations
Now every purchase you make can support your cause!
